name: Puzzle All
description:
Jigsaw puzzle is a popular game worldwide, it is the most changeful with many different difficulty levels, and people will never be bored.
Features:
-14 Classifications, such as Animals, Flowers, Nature, etc.
- More than 300 pictures for game.
- 3 kinds of piece shape.
- Functions of Preview and Automatic Placing.
- Choose different backgrounds.
